name: Today's War
description:
THIS GAME MUST BE PLAYED WITH A FRIEND IN THE SAME COMPUTER.

HOW TO PLAY:

Left player (Gamers):

F1, F2, F3 - chose the unit you want to summon.

1, 2, 3 - Lane where the unit is going to be deployed.

Right player (Furbies):

NumPad7, NumPad8, NumPad9 - chose the unit you want to summon.

NumPad1, NumPad2, NumPad3 - Lane where the unit is going to be deployed.

Game created for: Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Game Jam
